LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveGreenCoat.label: Green army uniform
LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveGreenCoat.description: The Green Army uniform consists of a trench coat, boots, helmet, gloves, and a gas mask with a hose connected to a tank on the lower back.The coat is zipped down to the belt and has Green patches on the soldiers and wrists along with a Green trim around the bottom near the feet.
